page.title: 11Aday in the life of B Little
page.content: My name is Bruce.On waking in the morning, I get up, wash,then have breakfast usually cereals and a drink. I relax until 8:50a.m.when I walk to Hanley Castle High School.I am in the Lower Sixth preparing for A_Level examinations.On Friday morning I have chemistry followed by statistics. School lunch may consist of faggots, chips,a drink and a chocolate bar. Total cost 87 pence.As the day is Friday I have to wind the church clock. For this I collect the church key from the pub and then go to the church to wind the clock. Afternoon school consists of a physics lesson followed by a free period. Upon getting home at 3:30p.m. I have an hours driving lesson. After that I have a cooked evening meal. For the remainder of the day, I relax and watch television until I retire to bed
